comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build Identifier: 

This patch adds public API functions to allow C++ users of ctypes to get the JSInt64 or JSUint64 from the ctypes 64 bit integer representations.

Reproducible: Always
